title: 1663-A
statement: A. Who Tested?time limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard output

processed.result: You are given a string.  You need to determine the length of the longest substring within the string that consists only of lowercase letters.
You are given a list of items, each with a weight and a value. You have a maximum weight limit.  Find the combination of items that gives the highest total value without exceeding the weight limit.
